summary: Adds 5 new followers that can be installed separately. They can be found in Four Shields Tavern in Dragonbridge. Also, My first MOD :DDD
descriptionHtml:
Adds 5 new followers that can be installed separately. They can be found in Four Shields Tavern in Dragonbridge. They specialize in archery but has no bows.

If you have Ghosu's Project Flintlock mod installed, the 5 new followers will have flintlock rifles equipped.


Link to weapons in screenshots:
Ghosu - Project Flintlock: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26653/?
---------------
Link for the armour used in screenshots:
Light Imperial Gear: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=211262774&searchtext= or something similar on Nexus: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5588/
Tricone Hat: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20911/?
-------------
Other mods used:
Mixed Unit Tactics: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30578/?
author: Followers - ArcticWolfAlpha
